tool_description: Formats identification results into structured field guide style output with species information, identification confidence, and key distinguishing features.

key_features.description: Distinguishing features that led to identification

observation_quality.description: Quality of observation data: excellent, good, fair, poor

error_messages: Missing species name: Provide the identified species name.
Invalid confidence level: Confidence must be number between 0 and 100.
No key features: Include at least one distinguishing feature.
Too many features: Limit key_features to 15 items for readability.
Invalid observation quality: Use one of [excellent, good, fair, poor].
usage: Input final species_name, confidence_level, and key_features from identification process. Optionally add alternative_species and observation_quality for complete field guide entry.

formatted_identification.description: Complete field guide style identification summary

field_marks.description: Formatted list of diagnostic field marks
